alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:33PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Sampson County through 830 PM EDT... At 733 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Godwin, or 13 miles northwest of Clinton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roseboro, Newton Grove, Salemburg, Autryville and Hobbton. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 340 and 352. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
